game.name: Cursed Treasure 2
game.description:
The king of this kingdom looks very protective for the gem stones he has saved so far. Suddenly, the multiple hordes of good heroes have come into power and they have decided to capture the gems as the King wants to use them for his personal needs. In the second version of Cursed Treasure, your job is to defend your gems against champions, enemies and bosses. Would you think that you can do it on your own? Join Cursed Treasure 2 and be prepared to gather all the evil forces to build towers strategically!

Apart from building your own towers, you also have to cast the might spells, and drink soda to protect your gems against your enemies. Feel free to do whatever you can to stop the good heroes of king from touching your gems in this HTML5 war game! Plan a strategy to build multiple towers on the tiles of the same colour! Cut down the forests by using a spell in case of finding difficulty in building towers on the forest tiles!

Begin with the more ground-covered towers and then upgrade them using points you collect! Do not forget to miss out the gold items to collect and kill minions as each minion killing will help you get money. Keep collecting the money until you get the next acid, fire or lightning tower in this cool tower defense game! There are different realms under attack in this amazing fighting game. Remember placement of towers is vital and you must keep your eyes on the multiple towers and funds available in your store. Good luck to complete all missions through different levels and have a blast without download on atmegame.com!
